news.title: Family home of primary-school children targeted in gun attack as part of dangerous Dublin feud

news.title: The Irish Independent’s View: Pure play replaces puke football as shrewd Kerry take All-Ireland football title
news.summary: Puke football is in the past. The era of the blanket defence smothering the opposition was killing off Gaelic football as a spectacle, and is now consigned to history.

news.title: Ask Allison: I’m absolutely devastated by the loss of my beloved parents and my husband finds it annoying. Am I abnormal?
news.summary: I recently lost both my parents within two years and I was incredibly close to both of them. I am married and have one teenage son, so I do have other family left, but I am so incredibly bereft that I wonder if it is abnormal. Every time I walk through the door, I break down into tears and can't begin to do what needs to be done.

news.title: ‘Pure heart and determination’ – Kerry fans rejoice after epic display to land the Kingdom’s 39th All-Ireland
news.summary: While Kerry fans don’t often go too long between drinks out of the Sam Maguire trophy, their 39th title yesterday tasted a little bit sweeter than the rest.
